snippet.title: American flag desecration on the rise

localized.description:
The flag is almost sacred in American society; children pledge allegiance to it and soldiers raise it in important ceremonies. People mistreating the flag always touches a sensitive nerve, but the trend has seen a resurgence within the United States. Many say they are doing it to highlight the mistreatment of African Americans and the rise of American interventionism. RT’s Caleb Maupin reports.
